Trade/Device Name(s): GenASIs HiPath IHC Family for HER2 (4B5)
GenASIs HiPath IHC Family for PR (1E2)
GenASIs HiPath IHC Family for ER (SP1)
GenASIs HiPath IHC Family for Ki67 (30-9)
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): GenASIs HiPath IHC Family system (includes slide capture camera, microscope, computer, monitor, keyboard, mouse)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for GenASIs HiPath IHC Family system for image capture, management, and analysis of immunohistochemically stained slides in breast cancer tissue.
Indications for Use Summary: Aids pathologists in the detection and measurement of HER2, PR, ER, and Ki67 protein in formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded breast cancer tissue, using immunohistochemically stained slides as an adjunctive computer-assisted methodology.
